TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AdCreatedEventHandler(object sender, AdCreatedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed AdCreatedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub AdCreatedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As AdCreatedEventArgs)
public delegate void AdCreatedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, AdCreatedEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示處理 控制項之 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時控制項在網頁上顯示通知。The event is raised when the control displays an advertisement on the page. 當您建立 委派 (Delegate) 時，就可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它會取得與公告相關聯的 URL 時控制項，便會建立並將它顯示在控制項下方。It gets the URL associated with the advertisement when the control gets created and displays it below the control. 這個範例需要在下列範例中所列的 XML 檔案 (Ads.xml)。This example requires the XML file (Ads.xml) listed in the example below. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何將 XML 檔案，其中包含通知資訊的格式。The following code example demonstrates how to format the XML file that contains the advertisement information. 如需有關 XML 檔案的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性類別。For more information on the XML file, see the property of the class. [!code-xml[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example#2](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example/Common/App_Data/Ads.xml#2)] [!code-aspx-csharp[AdCreatedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventHandler/CS/adcreatedeventhandlercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[AdCreatedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventHandler/VB/adcreatedeventhandlervb.aspx#1)]
